title: Goal Kick
author: Boink.Games
essence: Ball at center, moving target band on the goal. Tap to shoot; TTS feedback for Goal or Miss; auto-restart with countdown
reactions: This game is licensed as public domain by Axiologic Research, and a gift to Albert-David Alboaie by the founder of Axiologic Research.
